input.sentences: the groom was waiting for his bride to come .
the music played as she entered .
he looked down the aisle nervous yet excited .
they smiled at each other as they recited their vows .
output.sentences: The groom is patiently waiting for the bride.
The music played as the bride entered.
The groom both looked nervous and excited.
As the vows were recited the bride & groom couldn't help but smile.
